CustomField.description: Calculated from the sum of all Opportunity Products (those that contribute to TCV and those that do not. Old Help Text said: Calculated from the sum of Product TCV associated with the Opportunity and uncommitted audio. (Does not include existing services)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculated from the sum of all Opportunity Products. Those that contribute to TCV and those that do not. (does not include existing services)
CustomField.label: Total Opportunity Revenue (Prior 1/1/17)
